paper_name: Structure of a Hallucinogen-Activated Gq-Coupled 5- HT2A Serotonin Receptor

pockets.description: Conserved interactions observed in all three structures reveal a shared mechanism for HTR2A binding. A salt bridge is observed between D155 and a positively charged nitrogen in each ligand, which is a critical interaction for ligand binding in serotonin and other monoamine receptors.
